name: Blazesaw
description:
Fullscreen recommended (click the button in the bottom right in browser, press F4 on windows)

A short Castlevania-inspired game made in 3 days for Summer Santa 2021, for Coyote Barracuda. Features 4 levels and 1 boss. All graphics and music are original content.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: walk menacingly
  • Spacebar/Z/W/up: jump
  • Hold left mouse button to use your chainsaw.

Game Maker Studio 2 Source code is available to download
